instruction: Given a list of 10 different types of fruit, classify the the fruit according to their skin color.
input: Banana, Orange, Apple, Dragon Fruit, Pear, Mango, Papaya, Pear, Peach, Avocado
output:
Yellow Skin: Banana, Mango, Papaya
Orange Skin: Orange
Green Skin: Apple, Pear
Red Skin: Dragon Fruit
White Skin: Pear
Pink Skin: Peach
Brown Skin: Avocado
